name: Lumber
description:
A relaxing open world, survival-like, cookie-clicker like, tycoon game.

Collect resources to hire workers to collect more resources for you!

Made for the Middlesex University 2020 Cabin Fever game jam.

All assets made by me except:

BGM by Saj

Font(Made_Tommy) https://www.dafont.com/made-tommy.font?text=Sell+All&back=theme

Grass normal map (https://everytexture.com/everytexture-com-stock-nature-grass-texture-00004/)

Source project is included if you want to see something.
